languages.text: "Изменники ворвались на мостик, а затем привели эту тварь. Мы держали оборону, но стоило чудовищу посмотреть на нас, как в голове все помутилось. Будто марионеткой стал. Ксеносские мороки!"

"The renegades stormed the bridge and then brought that thing in. We held our ground, but as soon as the monster looked at us, my mind went blank. It was like being a puppet. Damn those xenos tricks!"
languages.original_text: "Изменники ворвались на мостик, а затем привели эту тварь. Мы держали оборону, но стоило чудовищу посмотреть на нас, как в голове все помутилось. Будто марионеткой стал. Ксеносские мороки!"

traits.locale_text: "The renegades stormed the bridge and then brought that thing in. We held our ground, but as soon as the monster looked at us, my mind went blank. It was like being a puppet. Damn those xenos tricks!"

"The renegades stormed the bridge and then brought that thing in. We held our ground, but as soon as the monster looked at us, my mind went blank. It was like being a puppet. Damn those xenos tricks!"

languages.text: «Los rebeldes asaltaron el puente y trajeron a esa cosa. Nos resistimos, pero en cuanto ese monstruo nos miró mi mente quedó en blanco. Era como ser una marioneta. ¡Malditas artimañas xenos!».
languages.original_text: "The renegades stormed the bridge and then brought that thing in. We held our ground, but as soon as the monster looked at us, my mind went blank. It was like being a puppet. Damn those xenos tricks!"

traits.locale_text: «Los rebeldes asaltaron el puente y trajeron a esa cosa. Nos resistimos, pero en cuanto ese monstruo nos miró mi mente quedó en blanco. Era como ser una marioneta. ¡Malditas artimañas xenos!».

languages.text: 「反逆者たちがブリッジを襲撃して、あれを連れてきたんです。なんとか持ちこたえていましたが、怪物がこちらを見たとたん、頭が真っ白になりました。私はまるで、操り人形のようでした。くっ、異種族の罠ですよ！」
languages.original_text: "The renegades stormed the bridge and then brought that thing in. We held our ground, but as soon as the monster looked at us, my mind went blank. It was like being a puppet. Damn those xenos tricks!"

traits.locale_text: 「反逆者たちがブリッジを襲撃して、あれを連れてきたんです。なんとか持ちこたえていましたが、怪物がこちらを見たとたん、頭が真っ白になりました。私はまるで、操り人形のようでした。くっ、異種族の罠ですよ！」

languages.text: “那群叛乱分子冲进了舰桥，带着那个东西一起冲了进来。我们本来守住了阵地，但那个怪物盯着我们的时候，我的脑子变得一片空白，就像木偶一样！那些该死的异形！那些肮脏的把戏！”
languages.original_text: "The renegades stormed the bridge and then brought that thing in. We held our ground, but as soon as the monster looked at us, my mind went blank. It was like being a puppet. Damn those xenos tricks!"

traits.locale_text: “那群叛乱分子冲进了舰桥，带着那个东西一起冲了进来。我们本来守住了阵地，但那个怪物盯着我们的时候，我的脑子变得一片空白，就像木偶一样！那些该死的异形！那些肮脏的把戏！”

languages.text: "Die Abtrünnigen haben die Brücke gestürmt und dann dieses Ding hereingebracht. Wir haben unsere Stellung verteidigt, doch sobald das Monster uns angesehen hat, war mein Verstand schlagartig völlig benebelt. Es war, als wäre ich eine Marionette. Diese verfluchten Xenos-Tricks!"
languages.original_text: "The renegades stormed the bridge and then brought that thing in. We held our ground, but as soon as the monster looked at us, my mind went blank. It was like being a puppet. Damn those xenos tricks!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Abtrünnigen haben die Brücke gestürmt und dann dieses Ding hereingebracht. Wir haben unsere Stellung verteidigt, doch sobald das Monster uns angesehen hat, war mein Verstand schlagartig völlig benebelt. Es war, als wäre ich eine Marionette. Diese verfluchten Xenos-Tricks!"

languages.text: « Les renégats ont pris le pont d'assaut et ont amené cette chose. On a vraiment essayé de tenir bon, mais quand le monstre a posé les yeux sur nous, mon esprit s'est comme... vidé. J'avais l'impression d'être devenu une marionnette. Maudits soient ces xénos et leurs tours de passe-passe ! »
languages.original_text: "The renegades stormed the bridge and then brought that thing in. We held our ground, but as soon as the monster looked at us, my mind went blank. It was like being a puppet. Damn those xenos tricks!"

traits.locale_text: « Les renégats ont pris le pont d'assaut et ont amené cette chose. On a vraiment essayé de tenir bon, mais quand le monstre a posé les yeux sur nous, mon esprit s'est comme... vidé. J'avais l'impression d'être devenu une marionnette. Maudits soient ces xénos et leurs tours de passe-passe ! »

languages.text: "Hainler köprüye akın etti ve sonra da bu şeyi getirdiler. Geri çekilmedik ancak bu yaratık bize bakar bakmaz zihnim tamamen boşaldı. Kukla olmak gibiydi. Kahrolası zenoların kahrolası oyunları!"
languages.original_text: "The renegades stormed the bridge and then brought that thing in. We held our ground, but as soon as the monster looked at us, my mind went blank. It was like being a puppet. Damn those xenos tricks!"
